name: Girl Travels Forest of Dream
description:
■Middle school student, Girl! is!
The girl, who was frustrated by her uncle's overprotection, wakes up in a strange forest. All she got is only a machete.
"Where am I? but... first of all, hungry!"




■Enjoy a simple and short story that saves the world!
The girl has no experience of reincarnation, no special ability. Just a little survival knowledge and a healthy body.
But coincidence, necessity, and small warm hearts come together, and the girl...



■Easy and simple battle
Avoid enemies when they come, and if you see a gap, join forces in machete and hit them!
Often, using other tool than machete makes it easier to fight battles.



■Try out various production recipes.
You can make many things with materials from monsters or your surroundings.
Make, test, and challenge the next boss!



■Eat a balanced diet.
Understand the role of the four major nutrients, and maintain a healthy body with a balanced diet.
Picky food is really, really bad!
